00007  *  This special class reads all the strings
00008  *  out of an exe-file. It also can identify
00009  *  what string the program needs.
00010  */

00012 #include "CMessages.h"
00013 #include "../StringUtils.h"
00014 #include "../CLogFile.h"

00017 CMessages::CMessages(unsigned char *p_exebuf, char episode, int version) :
00018  mp_exe(p_exebuf)
00019 {
00020  m_episode = episode;
00021  m_version = version;
00022 }
00023 
00024 // This function reads the strings specified between the offsets,
00025 // and creates a pair for for the map
00026 std::pair<std::string, std::string>
00027 CMessages::extractString( std::string matchingstring, unsigned long start, unsigned long end, long offset )
00028 {
00029  std::string Text;
00030 
00031  for(unsigned long pos=start+offset ; pos<end+offset ; pos++)
00032  {
00033   while(mp_exe[pos] == 0xA)
00034   {
00035    Text += mp_exe[pos];
00036    pos++;
00037    if(mp_exe[pos] == 0x0)
00038     pos++;
00039   }
00040 
00041   if(mp_exe[pos] == 0x0)
00042    break;
00043 
00044   Text += static_cast<char>(mp_exe[pos]);
00045  }
00046 
00047  return make_pair(matchingstring, Text);
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool CMessages::extractGlobalStrings()
00051 {
00052  std::map<std::string, std::string> StringMap; // Structure which stores all the extracted string
00053 
00054  // Here we begin to extract all the proper Strings
00055  switch(m_episode)
00056  {
00057   case 1:
00058   {
00059    switch(m_version)
00060    {
00061     case 131:
00062     {
00063      StringMap.insert( extractString( "CTSPACECHEAT", 0x14DEE, 0x14E51 ) );
00064      StringMap.insert( extractString( "GODMODEON", 0x14EF6, 0x14F06 ) );
00065      StringMap.insert( extractString( "GODMODEOFF", 0x14F07, 0x14F18 ) );
00066      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_StatusBox" , 0x15052, 0x150F5, -512 ) );
00067      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_SHIP" , 0x1679B, 0x167D3, -512 ) );
00068      StringMap.insert( extractString( "LIVES_LEFT" , 0x160D8, 0x160E5, -512 ) );
00069      // Message hint Dialogs
00070      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_YSIYM_LVL2" , 0x15280, 0x15314, -512 ) );
00071      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_YSIYM_LVL6" , 0x1531A, 0x153B2, -512 ) );
00072      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_YSIYM_LVL9" , 0x153B4, 0x1544C, -512 ) );
00073      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_YSIYM_LVL10" , 0x1544E, 0x154E6, -512 ) );
00074      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_YSIYM_LVL11" , 0x154E8, 0x1553E, -512 ) );
00075      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_YSIYM_LVL12" , 0x15540, 0x155D9, -512 ) );
00076      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_YSIYM_LVL15" , 0x155DB, 0x1565D, -512 ) );
00077      // Finale Text
00078      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART1" , 0x15E24, 0x15EB0, -512 ) );
00079      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE1" , 0x15EBD, 0x15EFA, -512 ) );
00080      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE2" , 0x15EFB, 0x15F2F, -512 ) );
00081      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE3" , 0x15F30, 0x15F7E, -512 ) );
00082      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE4" , 0x15F7F, 0x15F9B, -512 ) );
00083      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE5" , 0x15F9C, 0x15FE1, -512 ) );
00084      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE6" , 0x15FE2, 0x15FF5, -512 ) );
00085      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE7" , 0x15FF6, 0x16006, -512 ) );
00086      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP1_ESEQ_PART2_PAGE8" , 0x16007, 0x16071, -512 ) );
00087      StringMap.insert( extractString( "TO_BE_CONTINUED" , 0x16072, 0x16085, -512 ) );
00088     } break;
00089    }
00090   } break;
00091   case 2:
00092   {
00093    switch(m_version)
00094    {
00095     case 131:
00096     {
00097      StringMap.insert( extractString( "CTSPACECHEAT", 0x19AC6, 0x19B1B, -512 ) );

00102      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_VE_NOJUMPINDARK" , 0x1A2D2, 0x1A391, -774 ) );
00103      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_VE_EVILBELTS" , 0x1A391, 0x1A4A6, -774) );
00104      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_LVL4_TargetName" , 0x19CCF, 0x19CD5, -804) );
00105      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_LVL6_TargetName" , 0x19CD6, 0x19CDB, -804) );
00106      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_LVL7_TargetName" , 0x19CDC, 0x19CE2, -804) );

00109      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_LVL13_TargetName" , 0x19CF2, 0x19CF6, -804) );
00110      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_LVL15_TargetName" , 0x19CF7, 0x19CFD, -804) );
00111      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_LVL16_TargetName" , 0x19CFE, 0x19D07, -804) );
00112      // Message Boxes
00113      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_ESEQ_PART1" , 0x1A4A7, 0x1A558, -774) );
00114      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_ESEQ_PART2" , 0x1A559, 0x1A5F0, -774) );
00115      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_ESEQ_PART3_PAGE1" , 0x1A5FD, 0x1A638, -774) );
00116      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_ESEQ_PART3_PAGE2" , 0x1A639, 0x1A6CD, -774) );
00117      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_ESEQ_PART3_PAGE3" , 0x1A6CF, 0x1A72D, -774) );
00118      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP2_ESEQ_PART3_PAGE4" , 0x1A72F, 0x1A739, -774) );
00119      StringMap.insert( extractString( "TO_BE_CONTINUED" , 0x1A73A, 0x1A74D, -774 ) );
00120     } break;
00121    }
00122   } break;
00123   case 3:
00124   {
00125    switch(m_version)
00126    {
00127     case 131:
00128     {
00129      StringMap.insert( extractString( "CTSPACECHEAT", 0x1BC9E, 0x1BCF3, -512 ) );
00130      StringMap.insert( extractString( "GODMODEON", 0x1BD80, 0x1BD90, -512 ) );
00131      StringMap.insert( extractString( "GODMODEOFF", 0x1BD91, 0x1BDA2, -512 ) );
00132      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_StatusBox" , 0x1BCF4, 0x1BD7F, -512 ) );
00133      StringMap.insert( extractString( "LIVES_LEFT" , 0x1CAEE, 0x1CAFB, -806 ) );
00134      // Ship Messages
00135      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_SHIP1" , 0x1D100, 0x1D173, -765) );
00136      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_SHIP2" , 0x1D174, 0x1D1D1, -765) );
00137      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_SHIP3" , 0x1D1D2, 0x1D24C, -765) );
00138      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_SHIP4" , 0x1D24D, 0x1D2C4, -765) );
00139      //Mortimer
00140      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_MORTIMER" , 0x1C3B2, 0x1C3D7, -805) );
00141      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_MORTIMER2" , 0x1C3D8, 0x1C499, -805) );
00142      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_MORTIMER3" , 0x1C49B, 0x1C53E, -805) );
00143      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_MORTIMER4" , 0x1C53F, 0x1C606, -805) );
00144      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_MORTIMER5" , 0x1C607, 0x1C629, -805) );
00145      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_MORTIMER6" , 0x1C62A, 0x1C692, -805) );
00146      // Ending Pages
00147      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_ESEQ_PAGE1" , 0x1C692, 0x1C72E, -805) );
00148      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_ESEQ_PAGE2" , 0x1C730, 0x1C7A5, -805) );
00149      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_ESEQ_PAGE3" , 0x1C7A7, 0x1C811, -805) );
00150      StringMap.insert( extractString( "EP3_ESEQ_PAGE4" , 0x1C813, 0x1C81F, -805) );
00151      StringMap.insert( extractString( "THE_END" , 0x1C82D, 0x1C845, -806) );
00152     } break;
00153    }
00154   } break;
00155   default:
00156   {
00157    g_pLogFile->textOut(RED,"This version of the game is not supported!");
00158    return false;
00159   }
00160  }
00161  
00162 
00163  // Now pass all the Map to the global text structure
00164  // Still a bad idea, because it's global string.
00165  if(!StringMap.empty())
00166  {
00167   std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator i;
00168   for( i = StringMap.begin() ; i != StringMap.end() ; i++ )
00169   {
00170    g_pBehaviorEngine->addMessage(i->first, i->second);
00171   }
00172   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Loaded %d strings from the exe-file.<br>", StringMap.size());
00173   return true;
00174  }
00175  return false;
00176 }
